title: Xayah - Attacking GP barrels
body:
-use an ability with Xayah
-attack a GP barrel with your "feather auto attack"
-you won´t damage the barrel so that you can´t destroy it as long as you have feathers from your passive
-you can destroy them with normal autoattacks though

replies.body:
I was able to destroy the barrels with the feather-autoattacks but i need to use them as maintarget. (of course)
Of Course Xayah cant destroy the barrels without take it as main target. (Twitch cant do it too)
I was attacking them as main target and it didn´t work several times.
